Trade/Device Name(s): Stratus CS Acute Care CardioPhase hsCRP TestPak
Stratus CS Acute Care CardioPhase hsCRP Test Pak
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Stratus CS Acute Care CardioPhase hsCRP TestPak for quantitative determination of CRP in plasma using RPIA technology
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative determination of C-reactive protein in lithium and sodium heparin plasma for detection and evaluation of infection, tissue injury, inflammatory disorders, and as an independent risk marker for cardiovascular disease, for use by trained health care professionals in clinical laboratory and point of care settings
